narrativeHistory.narrative: Aria the Brave unleashed a relentless assault, overwhelming Malachar the Corruptor with raw power. The final blow was a devastating critical strike that echoed across the battlefield. A 7-hit combo left no room for Malachar the Corruptor to recover. Aria the Brave survived by a thread, battered but unbroken.
Aria the Brave's noble intentions have been corrupted by power and betrayal. Betrayed by those she swore to protect. The world will tremble at Aria the Brave's transformation.

consequences: Refugees flee from Genesis City, seeking shelter elsewhere.
The economy collapses in regions dependent on Genesis City.
